text: , son of Iemoto, was a kugyō or Japanese court noble of the Kamakura period (1185–1333). He held a regent position kampaku from 1313 and 1315. With a commoner he had a son Tsunetada. ==References== * Category:1282 births Category:1324 deaths Category:Fujiwara clan Category:Konoe family Category:People of Kamakura-period Japan
title: Konoe Iehira
